meanings.definition: The beginning or start of something.
meanings.sent1: The commencement of the race signaled the start for all the runners.
meanings.sent2: The commencement of the school year brought excitement to the students.
meanings.sent3: At the commencement of the party, everyone rushed to the dance floor.
meanings.sent4: The commencement of a friendship is like planting a seed that grows over time.
meanings.sent5: The commencement of a new chapter in life can be both daunting and exhilarating.

meanings.definition: A ceremony or event marking the beginning of something.
meanings.sent1: The commencement of the graduation ceremony filled the hall with joy.
meanings.sent2: The commencement of the concert was eagerly awaited by the audience.
meanings.sent3: The commencement of the wedding had everyone in tears of happiness.
meanings.sent4: The commencement of a new business venture is like a grand celebration.
meanings.sent5: The commencement of a journey starts with a single step towards the unknown.
